[Y]Mode 0 Pixel Art
[W]Bold blocks with strong personality.
[c][m.]
[W]Chunky pixels reward clear silhouettes
[W]and careful colour contrast.
[W]Strong shape language reads better
[W]than tiny detail clutter.
[c][m.]
[G]- Block out silhouette.
[G]- Add key highlights.
[G]- Test at game speed.
[m][m-]
[Y]ART RULE
[C]Readable beats ornate every time.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
